name: Nihongo Heroes
description:
"Nihongo Heroes" is an educational game that helps you learn Japanese in a fun way.

The Japanese writing system consists of two types of characters: the syllabic kana (hiragana and katakana) and kanji, the adopted Chinese characters. Each have different usages, purposes and characteristics and all are necessary in Japanese writing.

This game is using smart learning system that teach Japanese alphabet with vocabularies. While practicing Japanese writing system, you will learn new vocabularies.
